column4: Alright, I've got a kind of far out there q, that deals with linux like os's in general.  I downloaded an un-gzipped an app, it decompressed the app a nxmp3play*  it does not appear to be executable, what would the unix ommand be to make it executable?
and that's if it's a compiled binary that's ready to run (or a script that's ready to run).
